page.title: 13 Aston Clinton Haulage
page.content: Aston Clinton Haulage is the name of the biggest company in Stone. Aston Clinton is a village some 10 miles away.The company bought a large piece of land in the middle of Stone about 10 years ago and built their yard and offices. The firm has over twenty articulated lorries which are in constant use . The lorries travel all over Britain and throughout Europe. Local people are not always very pleased about having juggernauts based in the village as they do tend to shake the buildings when they go by.
